The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 9:00pm on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 7:00pm on Fridays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 10:00am to 3:00pm on Saturdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 1:00pm to 5:00pm on Sundays.
Student ID cards can be replaced at the ID services office located across the student success center (SSC).
The dining hall (Schulze cafeteria/caf) is open from 7:00am to 8:00pm from Mondays to Thursdays, 7:00am to 7:00pm on Fridays, 11:00am to 7:00pm on Saturdays and Sundays
The Hub is open from 7:00am to 11:00pm from Mondays to Thursdays, 7:00am to 5:00pm on Fridays, closed on Saturdays, 10:00am to 11:00pm on Sundays
The library is open from 7:30am to 12:00am from Mondays to Thursdays, 7:30am to 5:00pm on Fridays, closed on Saturdays, 12:00pm to 12:00am on Sundays
